short_description: This Assemblyline service is amazing and does amazing things.

__prompts__.short_description: Short one or two line description of what the service does.
__prompts__.short_description_fr: [FR] Short one or two line description of what the service does in French, if required.

stage.__prompt__: At which stage should the service run? (stages are executed in the order shown)

category.__prompt__: Which category the service is part of?

license.__prompt__: Which license would you like to use?
license.none: No license, I will add my own
